document_data.name: Ehjax
document_data.titles: First Vitanar of the Xedran Reefs, First Prophet of Ilxendren
document_data.mainbody: '''Ehjax''' was a greater vampiric [[ixitxachitl]] and ruler of the [[Xedran Reefs]] from the {{YearlinkName|885}} to the {{YearlinkName|985}}.
document_data.History: Crowned in 885 DR, Ehjax founded a new ixitxachitl society of the Xedran Reefs and the tradition of a vampiric ixitxachitl ruling for no more than one hundred years. If all their enemies were not defeated in one century under one vitanar, then that ruler was deemed unworthy in the eyes of [[Ilxendren]] and had to abdicate, biting the chosen successor to create a new vampiric vitanar.
